jld.title: Your Justia Elevate Platform Has Been Upgraded
description: We've revamped the Justia Elevate platform, unlocking new functionalities and capabilities for you! Experience new features such as a customizable setting to hide phone labels in attorney profiles for a sleeker appearance, and the flexibility to insert scripts directly into pages. Additionally, we have integrated opening hours and social media links into the schema.
description2: Security is always our top priority. We've updated your WordPress engine to the latest version. For more details, check out this post from WordPress.
description3: If you are using Justia Chat, our AI-powered lead generation tool, you now have the ability to change the closing message on the chat. You may choose from 2 new message options or create a custom message of your own. Find this in the Justia Elevate platform under Global Settings > Chatbots.
